title.rendered: Eldorado Stone’s Outdoor Fireplace Brings the Heat to This Old House

content.rendered: Who says you can’t cozy on up next to your fireplace during summer? This Old House’s June 2014 issue is right on point with Eldorado Stone’s Outdoor Fireplace featured in an article headlined “Staycation Destinations: 42 porch, patio and deck upgrades that will make you glad you stayed at home.” Featured under the “Patios” section, the caption featuring Eldorado Stone reads, “Add warmth. A fireplace like this one, built from cinder blocks, lined with fireproof brick, and coated with stucco, can anchor an entertainment area.”
